item.description: Dinner and a Movie! Come and join us for a cafeteria style dinner at the Cave @ 6pm or at the Boyer Auditorium @ 6:45 pm to see a movie in Spanish with English subtitles and a discussion after the movie. The movie is Cama Adentro/Live in Maid: A once-wealthy Buenos Aires socialite who has fallen on hard times finds the roles between herself and her longtime live-in maid suddenly reversed in director Jorge Gaggero's class-conscious drama.See website for full movie description and trailer: http://www.rottentoma... If you get lost finding the Cave or the Life Sciences Building, call Karen on her cell: 860-922-7997

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and a movie
